tweets.text: all summer long I have been grappling with my addiction to momofuku extra spicy chili crunch, and today, for the first time, i put it on pizza instead of ramen, wish me luck
@hellonearthis @rctatman This is awesome
To be clear: I am not proposing the government launch some sort of Ender's Game-inspired program to get hundreds of children to solve climate change by playing Sim City, but I'm also not not
there should be a clear path, with professional-level tools, that smart enterprising young people could use to solve our problems directly through data analysis and modeling

if you made solving climate change as accessible and interesting as other things, like geohunter streams, imagine using that same gaming energy to optimize efficiency for different polluting industries, with bounties paid for X tons of carbon removed from the atmosphere

some part of me thinks that part of what is stopping us from solving these huge problems is that the levers/measures are so complicated to activate and understand, that truly, the sim city-ification of complex problems might make for a better world (maybe)
@anmccartney Congrats!!!!
@MapMakinMeyers we believe in you

I briefly deeply trusted @KeybaseIO but since the recent Zoom acquisition I think it's imperative to decentralize  my encrypted web communication. Trust, but verify. Here's my public key and a script to verify my fingerprint (89CD) against 3 backups.  https://t.co/ILkOfppqve
You can always find my public key at https://t.co/TlNnAdCvHv

If, for any reason, you need to confirm my PGP fingerprint, this is a short script to compare them across my website and two backup mirrors. All three should match or something weird is happening. https://t.co/wa2ni7QDie
